title: Trylon and Perisphere: 1939 New York World's Fair
description: Cohen, Barbara / Heller, Steven / Chwast, Seymour. Trylon and Perisphere - The New York World's Fair. New York, Harry N. Abrams Inc., 1989. Octavo. 80 pages with amazing illustrations throughout the publication. One double - page of the publication shows a Map of the Fairground. Original, illustrated Softcover. Excellent, FINE condition. Includes chapters full of color photography of fair products and merchandising. Chapters Merchandise of Tomorrow / The Entertainment Zone / A Designer's Fair /
author: Barbara   Cohen
